Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the definitions which are exposed to the user.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_OBJ_WITH_2_TX_ANT   256

With elevation disabled, FFT buffers can hold a maximum of 256 objects. A: Hwa memory size (M2+M3) = 32KB B: Azimuth FFT size = 64 C: log magnitude sample size = 2 bytes Maximum number of objects = A / (B*C) = 256

Definition at line 140 of file aoaprochwa.h.

#define DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_OBJ_WITH_3_TX_ANT   64

When elevation is enabled, FFT buffers can hold a maximum of 64 objects. A: Hwa memory size (M3) = 16KB B: Azimuth FFT size = 64 C: Complex sample size = 4 bytes Maximum number of objects = A / (B*C) = 64

Definition at line 133 of file aoaprochwa.h.
